short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track working time, breaks, and idle time for employees

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
KarmaOps Time Tracker is a Chrome extension designed to help employees and teams of KarmaOps monitor their work activities efficiently. It's features:

1. Tracks work sessions: Users can start and stop tracking their work time with a simple click.
2. Activity categorization: Allows users to categorize their work (e.g., Work or Training).
3. Break monitoring: Users can log break times separately from work time.
4. Idle detection: Automatically detects and records periods of inactivity.
5. Google Sheets integration: Securely saves all time tracking data to a Google Spreadsheet for easy review and analysis.
6. Privacy-focused: Requires user authentication and permission to access Google services.

This tool helps individuals and teams track their time efficiently, providing valuable insights into work patterns and productivity while maintaining data privacy and security. 

We would like to ensure you that this extension is developed for internal use only with the employees being aware of the time tracking. This extension has been developed with the request from employees to replace the process of manual tracking and make the tracking of the work much easier.
